name: International Conference and Exhibition on Genome Science
content: International Conference and Exhibition on Genome Science (ICEGS GERMANY - 2020) invites all the participants from all over the world to attend the upcoming Conference which is going to be held in Germany, during August 25-27, 2020 which includes prompt keynote presentations, Oral talks, Poster presentations and Exhibitions.The theme of our Conference is "Evolution Technologies on Genome Science and Molecular Biology". Genomics conference 2020 will feature advances in both computational and experimental methods, including single cell analysis, genetic engineering, population genetics, and statistical & deep learning. We hope that the Genome Science Conference in Germany 2020 will be the first of many and will help bring together innovative developers, discuss outstanding challenges across areas of biology, and form new collaborations and communities.
